page.title: 11Fashion for Women & Girls
page.content: In 1985 young girls and teenagers would probably wear fashion clothes from department and chain stores and boutiques. Cotton skirts and blouses are popular in pastel colours and primary colours and especially in white during the summer. Denim jeans are still popular. Teenagers like wearing three quarter length trousers plain brightly coloured tops and white cotton jackets. The creased look is fashionable and clothes are loose fitting. Older women tend to wear clothes that stay fashionable longer. Most women have a shirtwaister which is a dress with a shirt top with long or short sleeves,and a full or straight skirt. Most ladies like to wear separates, which are blouses or jumpers with straight or gathered skirts with hems just below the knee.
